backend/AltSignup.mo: Simple signup handler that validates non-empty username and password and returns a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control, supporting save, get, delete, and permission-checked queries.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts, setting II_URL env at runtime, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Config specifying allowed alternative Internet Identity origins.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page redirecting all 404s to index.html for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for landing, auth, onboarding, and feature pages.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity client and login configuration using environment-derived II URL.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel showing authentication state, timing, platform info, and stall detection when debugAuth=1 is enabled.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Error display with a message and optional Retry and Return to Landing buttons.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Help panel explaining popup behavior for Internet Identity with Retry and a direct II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Always-visible banner showing auth step, timing, outcomes, and recommended actions with optional Retry and II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup status with warming, ready, and failed states plus retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/DisplayName: Dialog asking users to set a display name with validation, save, and skip actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityCon: Card confirming the detected identity with display name, principal preview, and continue or switch options.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handler that processes II authorize callbacks and routes users based on onboarding state and session flags.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Loads II config asynchronously and wraps children in InternetIdentityProvider once ready.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostAuthDis: Checks post-auth state and prompts new users for a display name before navigating to onboarding.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedHea: Header with logout and account deletion actions that clear identity state, caches, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Global layout providing onboarding context and II authorization handlers before rendering routes.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal for task timing with start/pause/resume logic and completion handling.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config returning empty defaults and warning to use the proxy client instead.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context storing onboarding results with localStorage hydration, persistence, and clearing support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Manages user‑initiated auth attempts with flags, timestamps, correlation IDs, and sessionStorage tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks detailed auth flow steps, timings, correlation ID, slow steps, and outcomes for diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPageAutoredire: Auto‑redirects authenticated users away from login/signup based on their onboarding status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Runs a ping warmup on the backend canister with timeout, retries, and readiness tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, managing AuthClient setup, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalDisplayName.t: Manages per-principal display names and skip flags in localStorage with getters, setters, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Implements mobile‑safe Internet Identity login by pre-initializing AuthClient and returning structured login results.
Mobile II login hook using shared configuration helpers, pre-initializing AuthClient and providing structured login outcomes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Provides context and provider for password‑based identities, handling creation, storage, restoration, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Implements a phase-based timeout tracker for post-auth steps, exposing timeout state, elapsed time, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query calls for user profile operations using an actor, supporting retrieval, saving, and deletion with proper invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: React hook that tracks authentication progress and flags stalled steps based on timeouts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a chocolate-themed OKLCH color system for the app.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client that throws an error and is no longer used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Client for calling external AI proxy endpoints with validation, error handling, and type-safe parsing.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Utilities for safely parsing and stringifying JSON plus a key for storing onboarding results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily tasks page that fetches AI-generated steps, handles loading/errors, and displays task details.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Displays hardcoded chocolate inventory stats with period filters and authenticated header.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature slides, and modal navigation; it pre-warms the canister and links to signup/login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Complex Internet Identity login flow handling validation, stalled states, diagnostics, and redirects based on user profile.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi-step onboarding form collecting goal data, generating an AI plan, and saving the user profile before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page orchestrating Internet Identity auth, identity validation, diagnostics, and redirecting users to onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simplified backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the AI-generated onboarding plan with goal and weekly mountain details, or redirects users lacking onboarding data.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: React page that loads or generates a weekly goal plan, caches it, handles errors, and supports onboarding restart.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides structured auth step logging, correlation IDs, timing, and outcome reporting.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates ICP identities and detects stale sessions based on delegation and anonymity checks.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and manages their storage in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for auth flow decisions.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts unknown AI-provided values into strings and extracts validated string fields.
frontend/src/utils/sessionFlags.ts: Manages session-scoped flags for tracking new-account signup flows using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/sessionReset.ts: Clears all SweetSteps client-side persisted data including onboarding and weekly mountain caches.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, typography, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, navigation flow notes, and a known issue involving incorrect post-onboarding navigation. Marks the request as a fix request with no listed features yet.
